sources.duo: VWO central exam results (per subject, 5-year window)

vo_nt_index.label: VWO profile index – Nature & Technology
vo_nt_index.description: For each school/year: 0.50 × C(WISB) + 0.25 × C(NAT) + 0.25 × C(SCHK) using VWO central exam averages, then time-weighted over 5 schoolyears.

vo_ng_index.label: VWO profile index – Nature & Health
vo_ng_index.description: 0.35 × C(BIOL) + 0.25 × C(SCHK) + 0.40 × C(WISB), aggregated as a 5-year weighted average.

vo_em_index.label: VWO profile index – Economics & Society
vo_em_index.description: 0.333 × C(ECON) + 0.334 × C(BECO) + 0.333 × C_WIS^EM, where C_WIS^EM is based on Wiskunde A/B if present.

vo_cm_index.label: VWO profile index – Culture & Society
vo_cm_index.description: 0.333 × C(GES) + 0.333 × C_WIS^CM + 0.333 × C_TALEN, with C_WIS^CM from Wiskunde C/A and C_TALEN the mean of English/German/French.

vo_vwo_share.label: VWO share of passes
vo_vwo_share.description: VWO passes / all exam candidates (HAVO, VWO, VMBO) over multiple years, as a percentage.

vo_candidates_total.label: Total exam candidates
vo_candidates_total.description: Total number of exam candidates in the 5-year window.

vo_nt_index.label: VWO-profielindex Natuur & Techniek
vo_nt_index.description: 0,50 × C(WISB) + 0,25 × C(NAT) + 0,25 × C(SCHK) op basis van VWO centrale examens, daarna 5-jaars gewogen gemiddelde.

vo_ng_index.label: VWO-profielindex Natuur & Gezondheid
vo_ng_index.description: 0,35 × C(BIOL) + 0,25 × C(SCHK) + 0,40 × C(WISB), gewogen over de laatste 5 schooljaren.

vo_em_index.label: VWO-profielindex Economie & Maatschappij
vo_em_index.description: 0,333 × C(ECON) + 0,334 × C(BECO) + 0,333 × C_WIS^EM, waarbij C_WIS^EM is gebaseerd op Wiskunde A/B indien aanwezig.

vo_cm_index.label: VWO-profielindex Cultuur & Maatschappij
vo_cm_index.description: 0,333 × C(GES) + 0,333 × C_WIS^CM + 0,333 × C_TALEN, met C_WIS^CM uit Wiskunde C/A en C_TALEN het gemiddelde van Engels/Duits/Frans.

vo_vwo_share.label: VWO-aandeel geslaagden
vo_vwo_share.description: VWO geslaagden / alle examenkandidaten (HAVO, VWO, VMBO) over meerdere jaren, in procenten.

vo_nt_index.label: VWO 理工 profiel 指数（N&T）
vo_nt_index.description: 0.50×C(WISB)+0.25×C(NAT)+0.25×C(SCHK)，基于 VWO 统考平均分，在最近 5 学年按时间加权聚合。

vo_ng_index.label: VWO 理生 profiel 指数（N&G）
vo_ng_index.description: 0.35×C(BIOL)+0.25×C(SCHK)+0.40×C(WISB)，在 5 个学年上按时间加权聚合。

vo_em_index.label: VWO 经社 profiel 指数（E&M）
vo_em_index.description: 0.333×C(ECON)+0.334×C(BECO)+0.333×C_WIS^EM，其中 C_WIS^EM 由 Wiskunde A/B（若存在）构成。

vo_cm_index.label: VWO 文社 profiel 指数（C&M）
vo_cm_index.description: 0.333×C(GES)+0.333×C_WIS^CM+0.333×C_TALEN，C_WIS^CM 来自 Wiskunde C/A，C_TALEN 为英/德/法平均。

vo_vwo_share.label: VWO 通过人数占比
vo_vwo_share.description: VWO 通过人数 / 全部考试考生人数（含 HAVO/VWO/VMBO），按学年加权后的百分比。

vo_candidates_total.label: 考试考生总数
vo_candidates_total.description: 同一 5 学年窗口内的全部考试考生总数。
